title: Rajneesh Narain recommended as Director (Finance), Northern Coalfields Ltd - PSU Connect
content: Rajneesh Narain recommended as Director (Finance), Northern Coalfields Ltd  PSU Connect
description:
New Delhi: Public Enterprises Selection Board (PESB) on May 6, 2022, Friday recommended Mr. Rajneesh Narain for the Director-(Finance), Northern Coalfields Ltd. Currently, he is serving as the Chief Manager, South Eastern Coalfields Ltd.
